name: Goddess of Three
description:
Controls:

Left Arrow: Move left

Right Arrow: Move right

Spacebar: Jump

Objective: Guide the three shapes to the portal at the end of the level.

This is a game, actually... a prototype made for the Summer Slow Jams July 2019: 3-Button, 3-Color Games.

First of all, this game has quite a few bugs, I had a very busy and stressful week at work and couldn't really dedicate myself fully to it, but it should be playable. And there's an ending as well that makes a connection to another prototype of mine :)

For those who are interested, this is the first chapter of the mythology surrounding my "serious toned" games, which I will be working on starting August this year.
